title: EUNE ISNT WORKING AT ALL
body: I finished a ranked game with my friend and then boom , no stats , cant start another lobby , my LP didnt move nor did my IP , and when i re log in it says that i am in a game and tries to reconnect , but then a message error appears , when i click cancel , it just shows the reconnect button , but finished my damn game the fuck  is there any maintenance

replies.body: There's been no maintenance on EUNE that I'm aware of, but it sounds like you've had a pretty crappy experience.  I'd like to help!  Your specific issue seems like a pretty severe connection problem failing to reach the game server.  It's really important to start off with some basic network troubleshooting, which in most cases resolves issues like this.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if the results help!
